label.label: Use this number to set the address range
and to reference and/or label a SMD8
(Note: Initially a number of 2 or 3 may need to be entered for correct calculation)
The address of output 1 is calculated based on the CV values
Each local route is controlled by the respective local input

label.label: Sets the pulse lenght for outputs configurated as Pulse
Duration in seconds = CV value times .256
The default value of 31 gives about 8 seconds
Sets the output state to always be the same at power on
Only applies if Option 2 is selected
